attributes.action: Get Matt Hancock out of parliament
attributes.additional_details:
Providing false information causing unnecessary lockdowns.
Not having a risk assessment about how lockdowns are affecting the British public.
Impacts on mental health for years to come.
Undiagnosed serious illnesses because of shortage of appointments.
Not telling the truth about Track and trace numbers.
And not exposing how many false positives the test provides.
attributes.background: We want Matt Hancock to resign or be released by the government

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MP or Ministers to be sacked.
